channel.title: By Yourself - FroMan [Future Bass]
channel.description:
Hello, all! I've just come out with a new track called By Yourself!
Check it out using the link!
https://soundcloud.com/froman-rance/by-yourself?ref=clipboard&p=a&c=1

item.title: By Yourself - FroMan [Future Bass]
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Not my genre, but liking this one.
Particularly like the little cutaway hooks.

I think it might benefit from a bit more work on the mix, possibly a little more time on sound design too, as I think they both take away a little from a track with an otherwise really strong set of ideas and motifs.

I say this a lot, but imo it’s true here too… t’s crying out for a full vocal.
With the right vocal, I think it has the potential to get some serious traction.

Read full topic
